title.narrative: BD Identification System for Enhancing Access to Services (IDEA) Project

description.narrative: Establish a secure, accurate and reliable national ID system that serves as the basis for more efficient and transparent service delivery

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Section IV B 1 (b) of Schedule 2 | Description :No withdrawal unless the rules and regulations, satisfactory tothe Association, for the implementation of the National Identity Registration Act, 2010 have become effective | Due Date:30-Jun-2014
